## ResourceTypes.createResourceTypeFromConfig() function

Creates a [ResourceType](./ts-res.resourcetypes.resourcetype.md) from a configuration object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function createResourceTypeFromConfig(config: IResourceTypeConfig): Result<ResourceType>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ResourceType](./ts-res.resourcetypes.resourcetype.md)<!-- -->&gt;
